item.text: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di
[ge]
su ma 'ad+hen435songo byAts+tsha' la//
skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab
kyi ri bya rgod phung po la/ dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs cig
ste: thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/ zag pa zad pa// nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du
gyur pa/ sams shin turnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/ cang shes/
pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ rang gi don rab tu thob pa/ srid pa kun
tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa/ bka' yang dag pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad
la dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa sha stag ste/ gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni/ 'di ltar slob
pa rgyun du zhugs pa tsho dang ldan pa dga' bo'o// dge slong ma grags 'dzin dang/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chan mo la/
sogs pa lnga brgyatsam dang/ dge bsnyen pha dang/ dge bsnyen ma shin tumang ba kun kyang chos mthong ba sha stag dang
'thu@#// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/ ting
nga 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa// mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul can/ rtog pa med pa 'i smon lam dang ldan pa//
chos thams cad la mnyam pa nyid kyi bzod pa rab tu thong pa/ thogs pa mang pa'i stongs pa dang ldan pa// bstan pa za mi shes pa lasaso
yang dag par rig pa'i tshul khong du chud pa// mngon par shes pa chen pos rnam par rtse ba/ mngon par shes pa shin tum nyams pa/ mnyan
par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ e mad cing brtson 'grus brtsams pa/ lus dang srog la mi lta ba/ tshularAs pa mang//
gsagamang pa/ grags pa dang/ khe dang/ bkur sti'i semasamed pa/ zang zing ma pa'i chos ston pa// chos brab mo'i bzod pa sa
pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen po thob pa/ yid yongs su zhum pa mdang// bdud kyi las thams cad las yang dag pa ras pa/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad pa//
las dang nyon mongs pa dang phyir rgol ba rab tu brtson pa// pha bo' po'i sgo' ba thams cad kyis zil gyis mi non pa/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rtogs pa'i dka' ba/
chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing bstan pa la mkhas pa/ bskal pa grasamad pas smon lamangashin tubartsams pa/ bzhin 'dzam pa dang ldan pa// thog mar sna bu/ khro gnyer
med pa// snyan cing 'jam pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas pa// sobs pa mi chod pa// 'khor mtha' yas pa thol gyis gno
pa'am 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/ bskal pa bye ba mtha' yas par bstanapa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba lamakhas pa/ chos thams cad sgyu ma dang/ smig rgyu dang/ chu zla dang/ rma
lam dang/ sgra b.rAn dang/ mig yor dang/ nam mkha' dang/ dri ba'i grong khyer dang/ sprul pa dang/ gzugs ban lta bu r khong du chud pa/ sems yongs su zhum pa
mad pa/ sams can thams cad kyisems kyi rgyud dang/ shes pa phra ba dang/ spyod pa dang/ mosi pa khong du chud par bya ba la mkhas pa/ soms can thams cad la sdang ba mad
pa'i sems dang ldan pa// bzod pa rlabs po changang ldan pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rtogs par bya ba'i yi shes la mkhas pa// chos nyid zab mo dang ldan pas
za gting dpag dka' ba/ rang gi sems la dbang rab tu thob pa/ chos thams cad la bang shin tu thob pa/ las dang/ nyon mongs pa dang/ lta ba'i sgrib pa thams cad las rnam par
grol ba/ brten pa rtogs par bstan pa la mkhas pa// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i tshul zad mi shes pa la zhugs pa/ lta ba dang/ bag la nyal ba dang/ kun nas ldang ba thams cad
dang bral ba/ kun tu sbyor ba thams cad spangs pa// las dang nyon mongs pa thamaMs cad rab tuzhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ bden pa rab tu rtogs par bya ba'i ye shes la mkhas pa// chos
thams cad sgra brnyan dpa'odrab r rtag tu rgyun mi 'chadapar mos pa/ chos kyi tshul bstan pa tshad mad pa la'ajigs pa med pa/ bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin du khong du chud par bya ba la mu khas pa//
sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa rnam par dgod pa'i smon 'am gyis 'gro ba yongs su zin pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs yod pan bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin shug
tu rgyun mi 'chad par mon du gyur pa/ sas rgyas byung ba than sa dang nye bar 'gro ba lamakhas pa/ sangs rgyas dpagatum pa la gsol ba gdab par mkhas pa/ sams can gyi lta ba sna
tsa tshogs kyis yongs su bskyang pa'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa// ting nge 'dzin brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa la rnam par brtse ba'i yas rtogs par bya ba la mkhas pa/ yon tan brjong
pa bskal pa mtha' yas par mi zadapa dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs cig ste/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i sems dang 'a chen po bzung skyong dang/ byang chub sems dpa'asams dpan+targyun
po rin chen 'byung gnas dang/ byang chub sems pa'asams dpa' chenupo rin chen snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo rin chen byin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpasemA
dpa' chen po ded dpon dam pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achonapo skyes bus byin dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skyob srid dang/ byang chub sems dang na sems
dpa' chen po chu bdag lha dang/ byang chub sems pa' sams pa'achan po dbang pos byin dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po bzang po'i stobs dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa'achen po blo gros dam pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa'i blo gros dang/ byang chub sems dpa'ams dpa' chen po blo gros 'phel ba dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mtha' yas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po der yod mthong ba dang/ byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa' chen po sgrib mad blo gros dang/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu zhugs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po mthu dam pas rnam par gnon pa dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus mtha' yas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu brtson pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tusbyor ba dang/
byang chub sems pa'asems dpa' chen pom gtong brtson pa dang/ byang chub sems dparusems dpa' chen po nyi ma'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa'achan po bla ban+tisnying po
dang byang chub sems dpa'asams dang 'chen po blo gros dpa mdapa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang/ byang tshubasams pa'asams
dpa' chenapo mthu chen thob pa dang/ byang chub sems dang 'asams pa'achan po'ajam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa3sa pas dpa'achan po bdud kyi stobs rab tu
'dzoms pa dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blo gros dang/ byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen po lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa'achen po rtag tu lag brkyang dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snying rje charasams dang/ byang chub sems pa'asems dpa' chen po rgyan chen po dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po ri bo'i thom dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang/ gzhan yang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mu dag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'dras byed
kyis gdan seng ge'i khri bshams nas sku drang por bsrang ste/ gongs pa mngon du bzhag nas/ skyil mo krung bcas dbazhugs so// der bzhugs nas te pe'adzin gang du ting nge 'dzin thams
capar du bu dang/ khongs su chud pa dang/ rjes su 'brang ba dang/ 'du pa gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag go da nas bcom ldan
'das dgongs shing yang shug par mkhyen pas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhes te/ 'phrul gyi spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir rnam par gzigs so// de ltar gzigs nas sku thams cad nas
'od rab tu bkye ste/ de'i zhabs kyi mthil gnyis kyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnyis 'os kyapa'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cug cu byung ngo// zhabs kyi sor mo bcu las kyang

'od zer bye ba khrag khrig ba stong drug cu drug cu phyung ngo// zhabs kyi long bu gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug tu byung ngo// zhabs kyi bzhi pa gnyis las kyang 'od
zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug tu byung ngo// zhabs kyi pus mo gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug mu drug du byung ngo// zhabs kyi ba=/

gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo// sku sta zur gso las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug tu drug tu byung ngo// sku lta bu'i dkyil 'khor

nas kya 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug tu byung ngo// sku rtsib logs gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug tu byung ngo// thugs ka'i skyesaM bu chen po'amachan

dpal gyi be'u las kyapa'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug udrug tu byung// phyag gi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khribag ba stong drug tu drug du byung ngo// phyug lag ngaraganyis sa

kyapa'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgyastong drug ru ga ru byung ngo// sku phrag pa gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo/ mguro nas kyapa'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya

stong drug ru drug tu byung ngo// tshoms mchobu bzhi las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong druganu drug cu byung ngo// tshoms bzhi bcu las kyapa'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ga ru ga

tu byung ngo// sbyin gnyis nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug tu drug tu byung ngo// snyan gnyis nas kyang 'od zer bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug ru drug cu byung ngo// gshangs kyi sbubs

lhaganyis nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug du byung ngo// smin mtshams kyi mdzod sa nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug tu byung ngo// stong gi spyi gtsug nas kyang

'od zer bye ba khrag khrig ba stong drug tu drug cu byung ngo// zhal gyi sgo nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug tu byung ste/ 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu po de dag thams cad
kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas te/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams ganga'i klung gi byim sU snang ba chen pos khyab

par byas so// lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klungagi byem snyed snang ba chen pos khyab
par byas so// byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
snyad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// lho nub kyi phyogasamatshams su

'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bum seng snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas
so logag phyogs su 'thig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// stong gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams ga'i klung gi bye ma
dasnang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// sams can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang/ 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges
bar gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'dasakyis ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu 'gyed par mdzad de/ 'od nges kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi kha/
'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung
gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chenapos khyab par byas so// byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams
ga'i klung gi khyim snyang snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi byes snyad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// shar lho'i

phyogasamatshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// lhanub kyi phyogs mtshems su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi byam snyad snang ba chen
pos khyab par byas so/ nub byang gi phyogasamatshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// 'og gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gapa'i

klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so// steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ sems can gang gis khrod dmathong
ba dang/ 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang blanamad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tunges par gyur to// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dbazhin gsheg

pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad de/ shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad snang ba chen pos khyab
par mdzad do// lho phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do/ nub phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams ga'i klung gi bye ma sAd snang ba chenapos/

khyab par mdzad do// byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snying snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jigarten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
sId snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad snang ba chen pos khyab pa mdzad do// lhanub kyi phyogasamatshamaMs su
sang+ga@#// 'jig rten gyi khams ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// nub byang gi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang pa chen

pos khyab par mdzad do// 'og gi phyogs su 'tshog sngon gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// steng gi phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi byam seng snang
ba chen pos khyab par mdzad do// sems can gang gis 'od d mthong pa dang/ 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang namad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sa par
denas bcom ldan 'das kyis zhal gyi sgo nas lcags kyi dbang po bkram ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad lcags kyi dbang pos
khyab par mdzad nas/ zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do// lcags kyi dbang po de las kyaba'od zer kha dog sna tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'thon te/ 'od zer de dag thams cad la pamang po
yin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gsar gyi mdog tu snang ba/ 'dabs stong dang ldan pa/ sna tshogs su 'dug pa/ bstan sdug pa/ yid du 'ong ba/ kha dog bzang ba/
prazhim pa/ 'jam pa/ ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde bar 'gyur bsha stag kun nas gnas par gyur te/ parod dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing/ 'di lta ste/

pa pol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'dinying ston pa mdzad de/ de dag shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad du gshegs shing/ de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/

pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegasangashing/ de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/

pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ganga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing/ de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/

pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing/ de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/

pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan ng 'chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad du gshegasangashing/ de dag tu byon sa//

'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dgashar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma snyad du gangashegasangashing/ de dag

tu byonanas/ 'di lta ste/ pha bo'o tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs
shing de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ ba rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jigarten

gyi khams gang+gA'i klungagi khyim snyed dgashegs shing/ dudag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten

gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegasangashing/ de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// de dag stong gi phyogs kyi 'jig

rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi khyim spyod du gshegasangashing/ de dag tu byon nas/ 'di lta ste/ pha mol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyi chos ston to// sems can gang dag gis
chos de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sa par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'as kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de bzhug
shrI bzhin du/ sas rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin sa ga rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag ste/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do// rdzu 'phrul de mngon par 'dumadzad pas stong gsum gyi
stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug cugayos te/ g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// kun tu bab tshug yos so// 'gul to// rab tshu'agul to// kun tu rab tu
'gul to// ldog go/ rab tu ldeg go/ kun tu rang tu ldeg go/ chem cham/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu chem chem mo// 'ur 'ur/ rab tu 'ur 'ur kun tu rab tu
'ar 'ur ro// ngashigangashig/ rab tushig shig/ kun tu rab tu shig shig go/ mthu'amathon ni dbus dma'/ dbus mtho nani mtha'adama' ste/ pAl bus bags kyisanyam/
su bde bar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bdu ba skyed par gyur to// de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cigal/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
na sems canangamal pa dang/ phyol song gi skya gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang/ mi khom pa dang/ ngan song dang/ ngan 'gro dang/ log par ltung ba gang ji snyed
yod pa de dag thams cad rgyun chad par gyur to/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skul ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum
dang mtshem dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyilha dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to// de nas lha de dag dang/ mi de dag dga' ba dang
mos pa dang/ nyams bde ba de nyid kyis sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas dga' ba dang/ mos pa dang/ nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag bcom ldan 'aa gang/
na ba der dong zhing phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/ de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal kha thams cad dang/ byol song gi skye gnas thams cud dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad/ mi khom pa thams cad kyang nung
par gyur te/ sems can de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lha skal ba mnyam par skyes so// de nas mi de dag dang/ lha de dag dga' ba dang/ mos pa dang/ nyams bad pa nga nyid kyis sngon
gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dga' ba dang/ mos pa dang/ nyams bde ba thob par gyur pa de dag rang rang gi sasargyas kyi zhing de dag// de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang bzhugs pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas/ zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

thob par gyur to// gos med pa rnams kyang gos thob par gyur to// dbul po rnams kyang nor thob par gyur to// bkris pa rnams kyang khrus thob par gyur to// skom pa rnams kyang btung
ba thob par gyur to// nad kyis btab pa rnams kyang nd med par gyur to// lus nyams pa dang dbang po ma tshang ba rnams kyang lus dang dbang po tshang zhing rgyas par gyur to// la ba rnams
kyang l sos par gyur to// lus dang/ ngag dang/ yid kyi las kyi mtha' dang/ 'tsho ba mi dge ba ma spyas pa rnams kyang/ lus dang/ ga dang/ yid kyi zas kyi
mtha' dang/ 'tshob ma dge ba spangs par gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la/ dper na pha dang/ ma dang ! phunu dang/ sring mo dang/ mdza' bo
dang 4 gnyen pa dang/ grogs po dang mtshungs pa'i sams kyis sems mnyam pa nyid du gyur to// sems can thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod
pa dang/ gtsang ba dang/ zhes pa'i dring ba med de/ mi dge ba'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to// de'i tshe sams can thams cad bde ba'i rnam pa 'di lta/
zabu dang ldan par gyur te/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba de lta bu'i bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur to// de'i tshe sems can thams cad rnam pa/
'di lta bu sIshes rab dang ldan par gyur te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa ni dge ba'o// la ba ni dge ba'o// zhi ba ni dgu ba'o// sdom pa ni dge ba'o// bden pa ni dag ba'o// bag byed pa
cani dge ba'o// byams pa ni dgo ba'o// snying dron dge ba'o// srog chags su gyur pa thams cad la mi 'tshe ban dag ba'o zhes bya bar shes par gyur to// de'i tshe bcom
ldan 'das gdan sang ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs pas/ 'di lta ste/ dper na nyem bsgribs pa med pa nam mkha'i dbyings yongs su dag pa la 'dug pa 'am/ zla ba nya ba'i zla ba'i dkyil
'khor ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'og rten gyi khams ri rab dang bcas pa/ 'khor yug dang bcas pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ dbang byed dang bcas
pa lha dang lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa 'di bril gyis mnan tabazhugs n/ 'od dang/ sku mdog dang/ gzi brjid
tshadang dpal gyis mdzes shing lham/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang/
skum dog dang/ gzi brjid dang/ dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs pa de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad thel gyis
mnan te/ 'od dang/ sku mdog dang/ gabri brjid dang/ dpal gyis mdzes shingelhamamo/ lhan ne/ lha nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams/
gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snying thil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang/ sku mdog dang/ gzi brjid dang/ dpal gyis mdzes shing lham ma/ lha ne/ lhungangor bzhugs so// de bzhin du nub
phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi byam snyad zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang/ sku mdog dang/ gzi brjid dang/ dpal gyis mdzes shing lham me/ lhan n/ lhapar
bzhugs so// de bzhin dubyang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang/ skumadog dang gzi brjid dang/ dpal gyis mdzes shing
lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// de bzhin du bya shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi byis sad zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang/ skumadog dang/
gzi brjid dang/ dpal gyis mdzes shing lcam ma// lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// bzhin du shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi
byamasnyad zil gyis mnan te// 'od dang/ sku mdog dang/ gzi brjid dang/ dpal gyis mdzes shing lham ma/ lhan ne/ lhang ngar bzhugs so// de bzhin du wunub kyi phyogs mtshams
kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyadazil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang/ sku mdog dang/ gzi brjod dang/ dngal gyis mdzes shing lham ma/ lhan ni/ lhang nger bzhugs so//
de bzhin du nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klungagi khyim snyad zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang/ sku mdog dang/ gzi brjid dang/ dpa' gyis mdzes shing lham ma/
lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// dbazhin du 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma snyad zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang/ skumadog dang/ gzi brjod dang/ dpal
gyis mus shing lhamam/ lhan n/ lhung der bzhugs so// de bzhin du steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad jil gyis nan/ 'od dang sku mdog dang/
gzi brjid dang/ dpal gyis mdzes shipalham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nger bzhugs so// 'a lta ste/ dperan po'i rgyal po ra reb ri nag po gzhan zil gyis non par gnas pani mdzes
za0 shing lham ma/ lhan ni/ lhang nge'o// 'di lta ste/ dpon zla ba'i dkyil snyakhor skar ma'i gzugs thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o//
'di lta ste/ dpar na nyima'i dkyil 'khor 'od gzhan thams cad thil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me/ lhan ne/ lhang nge'o// de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
lha dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa bril gyis non par bzhugs panang/ 'od dang skumadog dang/ gzi brjid dang/
dpal gyis mdzes shing lham ma/ lhan ne/ lhang pa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i/ bcom ldan 'das kyi rang
bzhin gyi sku 'drab de bzhin du bstan to// de nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha'i ris dang/ kun snang dang ba dang/ tshas ris dang/ gzhan
'phrul dbang byed dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ dag3ldan dang/ mtshon dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i risakyi lha gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i saargyas gdanasang li khri la bzhugs pamathong nas dga' zhing spro ba dang/ yid bde zhing rab tu dga' la/ nyams bde ba dang/ yid bad
bskyes nas/ lha rdzas kyi ma tog dang/ lha rdzas kyi 'brang ba dang/ lha rdzas kyi sos dang/ lha rdzas kyi byug pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi phye ma dang/ lha rdzas kyi
byug spos dang/ lha rdzas kyi ut+pal dang/ paspyodang/ kumu da dang/ pun da ra ka dang/ na' u0f7ana dang/ so'u la ban d+hi dang/ lha rdzas kyi ma tog ke sa ra dang/ tam la'i lam
dang lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang/ lha rdzas kyi rgyan dang 3 lha rdzas kyi gags dang/ lha rdzas kyi rgyal mtshan dang/ lha rdzas kyi ba ngan mang po thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang
na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ ma tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ byug spos dang/ ut+pal dang/ pad+mo dang/ ku mu da dang/ panang
ri ka dang/ nalin dang/ so'u shun d+hi dang/ ma rtog kas ra dang/ tam lasalam dang/ na bza' dang/ rgyan dang gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ lha'i bu dan dag
gis bcom ldan 'das la gtor to// mngon par gtor to// ba tugator to// stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'dul ba dang snod du gyur pa'i mi ji snyed
ga yod pa de dag kyang/ ma tog rgyu las skyes pa dang thang las skyes pa mang po khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to//
ma tog dang/ 'phrongab dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma la sogs pa dang/ na bza' dang/ rgyun dang/ gdugs dung/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan
de dag thams cad kyang de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'as kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la me tog la sogs pa'i khang pa brtsigs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'jig rten gyi khams tsam du gnas par gyur to// khang pa btsugs pa de dag las kyang lhardzas kyim rtog dang dar gyi lda lde mang po 'phyang bar gyur to// mngonapar 'phyang bar gyur to// rab tu byung
bar gyur to/ ma tog dang dar gyi lda ldi de dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dishin tu mdzes par gyur to// bcom ldan 'dasakyi 'od snang ba gsar gyi kha
dag lta bu des kyang shin tumadzes shing lham me/ lhan// lhung nger gyur te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir ji lta ba de bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams

bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to// de la 'dzam bu'igling gi mi rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/
'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// 'dzam bu'i gling gi ma rnams ji ltar soms pa de bzhin du/ nub kyi ba glang

shing chos ston to snyam mo/ shar gyi lus 'phags po'i mi rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ 'disnyam du sems par gyur to/ de bzhin

snyam du semasapar gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdunan bzhugs shing chos ston tosnyam mo// rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
blta bas chog mi shes pa demathong nas/ 'di snyam dusums par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnamasaM/

dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems pa'i 'khor dang thabs cig tubazhugs pa mthong bar gyur to// denasangashar phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi kham so gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa/
ba kun gyi pha rolan/ 'jig rten gyi khams na chen yod pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ne chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs
shipa'atsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang/ sacher g.yos pa de dang/ da bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta bas chogami
shes pa de ba thong nas/ bcom ldan 'aa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'as 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byungab dang
ngogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'adi lta bu gda'o ba 'di ci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung ba la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to//
rigs kyi bu 'di ni nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyad 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod// de na de bzhin gsheg

za pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyongango// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/
'dun pa'i klu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od drer kun ms 'byabs/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'as bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed de// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sa rgyusushAkya thub pa de blta ba dang/ de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang/ byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/
gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pabasgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms ba 'jug pa thams cad la dbang ma btublob pa de dgu blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bko' stsal pa/ rigasakyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab pa shesan/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed dar song zhig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dag
mtsha bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas na chen 'byung gnas kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung pa la/ pad+mo rinapo tshasna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung
gsar gyi mdog can stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus shAkya thub pa de la// bcom ldan 'as sUnami
mapa' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'dri ste/ pad+mogasar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa/
'di dag kyang/ bcom ldan+tangs de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes bgyis la par de dag gis gtor cig/ rigs kyi
bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis//
ra nyams par gyur ture/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bus/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de las/ pagasar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang// /
khye'u dang/ bu mo'i gzugs su 'jug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dum dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas// shar phyogs kyis sa
rgyas bcom ldan 'das gangaji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad l/ me tog dang/ spos dang/ bdug spos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ pham
dang na bza' dang/ rgyan dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshanadang bdun dag gis rim gror bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ phu dud du bya bu dang/
ts+tsaM mchod pa byed cing/ byang chub sems pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang/ byang chub sems pa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldoga'adas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa ga na ba dar dongs phyin nasaM/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po 'od zer kun nas 'byung bas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas/ bcom ldan 'dasal snyun mi mnga' ma/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ thomadog bde lam/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bdeb dang dgyes par spyod dam
zhes 'dri sta/ basmyogs ra gyi mdog can lag stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sosats+tshas na chen 'byung gnas kyis
bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas shAkya thub pas pad+mo ngo dgu bzhesanas/
shar phyogs kyi 'ag rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi byim snyad po de dag gi/ dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to// de nas pad+mo
de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cud rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ paspyod dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing/ da ltar pha khol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid
brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa desams can gangagis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang/ blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byung
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang/ rab du byung ba dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dag ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas shAkya thub pa la ma gror byas so// bkur stir byas so/// phu dud du byas so// mchod pa
shes rab kyil sol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po gnyis pa// de nas lho phyogs 'khogs su 'jig rten/
thagyi khams ga'i klung gi byol snyed 'das pa kun gyil rolan/ 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa mang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas/
rgyas mya namadu pa'i dpalazhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams 'angashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do//
nas 'jig rten gyi khams denA/ byang chub sams dpa' sems dang 'chen bomya nganamad pa zhes bya ba 'ga'adug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang/ sa chegayos pa de dang/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste
phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal du la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen
bo 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byur dang/ dag sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu ga' ba 'di tsi'i rgyu/ phyi'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/
pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis// byang chub sems pasams dpa' chen po mya ngan mdapal 'di skad/
ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ den do/
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs ngashepa tshoskyong ngo// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po rnams shes rab kyi pha/
rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'din de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa'achen po mya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang/
dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya nganamad pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed dar/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang/ de la phyag bgyi zhing bstan bkur ba dang/ byang chub sems pa3sems dang 'chen po de dag kun kyang phalatshar
gzhon nu gyur pa/ gzus dngaso so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa// ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa ba la dga' ba rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o//
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya nganamadapa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab pu shesan/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi
mdzad der song zhig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po mya ngan med
pa la pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu'as byung ba gsar gyi mdog can stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i saa
rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'ongs snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ tho mdog bde 'am/ skunyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod pa zhes
'dra ste/ pad+mogasar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di ga kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan mdapa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du
bskur ro zhes bgyis la pad+mo 'di dag gis gtoracig/ gas kyi bu sas rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhen/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya nganamed pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyasam ngan med pa'i dpal de las/ pad+mo gsar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dang 'a khyim pa
dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang ! bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dum dang 'grogs te sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang par gyur nas/ lho phyogs kyi
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang jisAd cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la/ ma tog dang/ spos dang/ bdug spos dang/ 'phrengab dang/ drug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/
na bza' dang/ rgyun dang/ gags dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ phu dud du bya ba dang/ mchod pa byed cing/
byang chub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang
na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis su spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
pa' chen porgya ngan med pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i
dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyama'i ma pa'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde bam/ snyanyams dpaldan nas/ bde ba dang dgyes pa raspyod
dum zhes 'dris/ pad+mogasar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'as de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pan+tisas rgyas mya ngan mad pa'i dpal
gyis bcomaldan 'angs la mchod pa'i slad du bskur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas d+d+hashAkya thub pas nga smyodi dag bzhes
u0fc4 nas lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'isas rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtar to// de nas
padrod dug gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur/ pa de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing 'de ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsam
tachos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang/ bla namadapa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'
sams dpa' chen po khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// phudud du byas so// mchod par byas so/// de nas nub phyogs legs
su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'au pa kun gyi pha rolan/ 'jig rten gyi khams nyob tu bzhes bya ba yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas

rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bozhugs ngashipa'atsho skyong sta/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nying yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas
'jig rten gyi khams dan/ byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ sna ba chen po de dwang/ sa cher g.yos pa de dang/ de bzhin gshags
pa'i sku bltan chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das dubazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chan 'opa'aphro gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom
ldan 'dis de bzhin ga4shegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'o 'phro de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang/
ga sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'adi lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dag
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas zin chan 'od 'phros/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros 'kha 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'gas/
kyi bu 'don shar phyogs legs su 'jig rten gyi khams ga'i klung gi sa snya'as pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma chud ces bya ba yod de/ ngan de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag

'tsho/ yi nata de 'dra'o// denas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen
bod 'phro la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyapa'ajig rten gyi khams mi mdzad der/ bcom ldan 'as de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs/

cod 'phros bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de lta ba'i dus la bab par ngashes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzadader song zhig/ de nas bcom ldan ras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa

bag yodapar spyod cig/ de sI'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams de skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa nyachen po dgan mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ der nyams par gyur

gling bo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu/
'anasnyonub kyi phyogs mtshams lags su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa lung dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugasongashipo'atsho skyong ngo// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa ston te/ 'di
ni de'i mthu yin de 'dra'o// nga nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'u chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs/
ba'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dras bag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams ma mdzad der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rtag
com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasangashAkya thub pa de blta ba dang/ de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal chara gzhon
nu gyurapa/ gzus dngaso so yang dag pa'igo pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad l dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ com
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting ba 'dzin gyi glang bo dam pa'i dpal gyis bka'astsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab par shes nA/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der sopazhig/
denas de bzhin gshegs pa dgru bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pat+tisangs rgyas ting 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dwangagyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam
bar gnon pa la/ pa rin po che sna tshogs kyi las byung ba gsar gyi mdog can stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyanaMmi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ thomadog bde lam/ skunyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam
zhes 'dri sta/ pagasar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dang la gyis/ bcom ldan 'das
la mchod nga 'islad du bskur ro zhes bgyis la papo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ gas kyi bu sus sakyi zhing der bag yod bang spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'ag rten gyi khams dar rgyas
ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/ nyams par gyur te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas
yin/ rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de las/
btsogasar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag byus te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa phye ba khrag khrig
brgya stong dus dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi 'ang de nas ma snang bar gyur nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyisangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ga pajisnyad cig bzhugs shi'atsho skyong ba de dag
thams cad la me tog dang/ spos dang/ bdug spos dang/ 'phrangab dang/ rgyug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ na bza' dang/ rgyan dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/
ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ phu dud du bya ba dang/ mchodapa byed cing/ byang yub sems dpa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen
zapos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos
phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan
ma 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'angs de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan
'das la snyun mi ma' 'am gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mgabapazam/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bdu ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'driste/ pad+mogasar gyi mdog can
'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sasargyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom
ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan ' dus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad+madi dag bzhes nas/

byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klungagi bye ma snyadapo de dag gi/ de bzhin bshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to//
denas pad+mo de dgagis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams rtsod rgyus bar khyab par gyur te/ pad+mod dag la de bzhin gshegs pa 'i skumang po bzhugs shing/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po
'di nyid brtsams tachos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang/ blan med po yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tus par gyur to//
tsha @#// byang chub sems dang 'asams dpa' chen po khyimo ba dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa
thabs bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la ma gro byas so// bkur stir byas so// phu dud du byas so//
mchod pa byas so// da nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'go rten gyi khan sa gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa kun gyi pha la na/ 'jig rten gyi khams snyapo byang chub kyi

ba'i rgyan shin tu yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgru bcos pa yang dag pari rdzogis nga 'is sa sa pad+mo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rapa kyi pha rol tuphyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na/ byang chub sogs dpa' sems
dba'achen po lag na pad+mos bya ba 'duga'adug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang/ sa cher g.yos pa de dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bltan chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom
ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa sangs rgyas pad+modam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i sasargyas baspyodam pa'i dpal de la 'di skadatses gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang/ dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dwang//
dbazhin gshegs ba'i sku 'dalta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i rgyu/ ci'i rkyen/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas
bad+mo dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i sams dpa' chen po 'gan pad+mol 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su 'ag/
rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma snyad 'das pa na/ 'ag rten gyi khams mi mdzad ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas shAkya
thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs M shapa'atsho skyong ngo// de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ 'ashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o/[:/]
de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pasmos/ bcom ldan bas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas padodam pa'i dpal de la 'di
skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas
shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang/ de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur ba/
thagakhrus dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub ba rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cadul dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o// bcom ldan sa
bskyod pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus la bab pa shes na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzod der song zhig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
lha pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas padam pa'i dpal gyiso/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na pal/ pad+morin po ma snatshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi ma dog
can stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas shAkya khrub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/
gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo mdog bde 'am/ sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'driso/ pad+mo gsar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ljon pa 'di dag
kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mom parI dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes bgyis la nga ngo 'di dag gis gtor cig/ rigs
kyi bu sas rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyibazhin/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/
ra nyams par gyur tur/ de nas byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po 'gan bcos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas
pad+mo dam pa'i dpal du las/ pad+mogasar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dgag blus te/ byang chub sams pa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang bu mo'i
gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgyastong du ma dpa 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nasami snang bar gyur sa/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyisas rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang jisnyad
go bzhugs ngashipa'atsho skyong ba de dag thams cad l/ ma tog dang/ spos dang/ bdug spos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ na babrel dang/ rgyun
dang gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gis rim gro bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ phu dud du bya ba dang/ mchod pa byed cing/ byang chub sems dang brtsi
'phrul chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'asad bzhinagashegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyasang+gashAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste
phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu'akhod do// phyogs gcig tu'akhod nas/ byang chub sems
dpa'asams dpa'anapo lag na pas/ bcom ldan 'as la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas
ba dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyanam ma'a'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ bro mdog bde 'am )snyanyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes
'driste/ paro gsar gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das dbazhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pad+mongs pa'i dpal
gyis bcom ldan das la mchod ba'islad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyasaNashAkya thub pas padod/
dag bzhes nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshems kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi byamasnyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isos rgyus
dag gang na ba der gtor to// denas pad+mod dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur to/ pad+mod dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs ngashing/
'di/'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang/ rab tubyung ba dang/ khyo'u dung/ bu mo'i gzugs su'adug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i
rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasapashAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur stir byas so// phu dud du byas so/
mchod pa byas so// denas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad 'dus pa kun gyi pha bol na/ 'jig rten gyi khams rdul gyi tshogs dang
bral ba zhes bya ba yod de/ den de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs paN+Disangs rgyaso nyima'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po rnams la/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams don/ byang chub sems pa'i
soms dpa' chen po nyim rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas/ snang ba chen po de dang/ sa cher g.yos pa de dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mngeshes pa de mthong
nas: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil la snang ba dam pa'i bal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/
za bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus rtema'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lo chenapo
'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang/ dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di ci'i// tsi'i rgyun de skad ces gsol ba dang/
bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pasre dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' soms dang 'chen po nyi ma rab
snang ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'din byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi byom snyad 'das pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams
ma mdzad ces byab yod du/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sos rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo// dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
bo rnams langashes rab kyi pha phol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'din de'i mthu yin te de 'dra'o// des byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa' chen po nyimarab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isaas nyi man+ti dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dbal la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyapa'ajig rten gyi khams/
mi mad der/ bcom ldan 'as de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isasargyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang/ de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang/ byang

dam pa'i dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyim rab tu snang bal/ pad+mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog can stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu

mag bdu nyam/ snyanyams dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'drista/ parogaser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang/ bcom

busas rgyasakyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cige/ deci'i phyir zhan/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyis/
ranyams par gyuratur/ de nas byang chub sems dpalasems dpa' chen po nyim rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

byung pa dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo'i gzugs su 'gu pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong pam dang 'grogs to/ sas rgyas kyi zhingang nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams
kyisas rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyad cigabazhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la/ ma tog dang/ sos dang/ bdug spos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/
bya ma dang/ na bza' dang/ rgyan dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bstan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang/ bkur sti bya ba dang/ phu dud du bya ba dang/

paN+Disangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyinanas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do// phyogs gcig tu 'khod
nas 5 byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyim rab tusnangangs/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'as de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
pa yang dag par rdzogs partsisangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal/ bcos ldan 'dras la snyanamima' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zomadog bde lam/
sku nyams dang ldan nam/ bdeb dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'drisnyo/ pad+mogasar rtsimadog can 'dab ma stongodang ldan pa 'di dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyima'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'as
a/ da/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas pad+mod dag bzhes nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyadapo de dag gi/ dobazhin gshegs pa dgrabcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas do dag gang na ba du gtorato// de nas paro de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams
de dgi thatshes cad rgyas pa rakhyab par gyur/ pad+mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs ngashing/ 'diltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'adi de brtsams te chos ston to// sa

khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi deg pa'i rtsa bas bcomaldan 'das de bzhinagashegs pa dgra bcom pa
'o gang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so// bkur ro byas so// phu dud du byas so// mchodapa byas so// de nas nub byang gi phyogs
mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klong gi bye ma snyad 'das ba kun gyi pha lon/ 'jig rten gyi khams dbang du gyur ba zhes bya ba yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
dag bar rdzogs pa'i sasargyas gdugs dam pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi phalol tu phyin pa 'ang nyid ya ngu 'gu par/
ston pa mdzad do// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de nA/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chen mchog ces bya ba 'dug dag pas/ snang ba chen po de dang/ sa cher g.yos
pa de dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bltan chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa/
gang na ba der song sa na nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ bcom ldan
'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang/ dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu ganga' ba mi'i rgyu/ cibaskyon/ de skad ces gsol
pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ byang chub sems dpa sams dpa' chen po rin chen mchog la 'di
skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu 'di ni shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi byam snyed 'das pan/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba
yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas shAkya sgrub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo// byang chub sems
ba' sems dpa' chen po mas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di ni de'imathu yin de 'dra'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po rin chen mchog gis 3
rgyu bcom ldan 'as de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sasargyas gdugs dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams
mimajed dor/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang/ de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang/
ba'i byang chub sems dpa3sa mas dang chen po de ga kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nga 'dzin dang snyoms par
'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad dumachi'o// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdags dam pos bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar de'i dus
la bab pa rangashesan/ 'garten gyi khams mi mdzad der song zhig/ denas de bzhin gshegs pa gra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas gdugs dam pas/ byang chub
sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nechenamchogal/ pad+mo ni po chasnatshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gsal gyi mdog can stong bskur te// rigs kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sasargyas shAkya thub pa de la/ bcom ldan 'das snyun mi mnga' 'am/ gnod pa ma mchis sam/ (thomadog bde 'am/ satam/
dang ldan nam/ bde ba dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'drista/ pad+mo gsar gyi mdog can 'dapa ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs
dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro zhes bgyis la pad+mo'adi deg gis gtor cig/ gas kyi bu sas rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i
phyir zhen/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub soms dpa' sems dpa'achen po de dag ni mgu bar dka' ba yin gyiso/ dor nyams par gyur tare/ do nas byang chub sems/
dpa' sems dnga' chen po rin chen mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'dres de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de las/ pado gsar gyi
mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong
@#/ dum dang 'grogs te/ sas rgyas kyi zhing desami sna bar gyuranas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyisas rgyasabcom ldan 'das gang ji snyad cigabazhugs/

gis bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gags dam ba/ bcom ldan 'das
la snyayi ma' ma 3 gnod pa ma mchis sam/ zo ma dog bde 'am/ skunyams dang ldan nam/ bdeb dang dgyes par spyod dam zhes 'driso/ bdogasar gyi mdog can
ma 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang/ bcom ldanu'as de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa sa rgyas gags dam pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i
slad du bskuno// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i saargyas shAkya thub pasapad+modo drug bzhes nas/ nub byang gi phyogs/
mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi byamasnyad po de dag gi/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas de dag gang na bder gtor to// de nas
pa po de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad+modi dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po
'di nyide brtsams techosaston to// chos bstan pa desems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang/ ban med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ngos par gyur to//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chenakho khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom

gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' pas byin pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces ba/sol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra

pa'i saargyas shAkya thub pas pa de dag bzhes nas/ stong gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma sAd po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

shing 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di nyid brtsams te chos ston to// chos bstan pa de sams can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang/ bla na med pa yang dag pa
rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang/ bumo'i gzugs su
zla'adugapa de dag gis kyayang mngag ge ba'i rtsa bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs partsisangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la/ rim gro byas so//
bkur sti byas so// bu dud du byas so// mchod pa byas so// denas de'i tsho skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
ni bo che'i rang bzhin du kun nas gnas par gyur te/ me togasalam sna tshogs kyis kun khyigang ba dang/ dar gyi lda ldi dang chun po kun nas bres pa dang/ snod sna tshogs nas bdug spos
sna tshogs 'thul ba dang/ pag bsam gying nga gi rgyan dang/ 'bras bu sna tshogs kyis yal ga'i rtsa mo g.yur za ba dang/ ma rtog gi shing dang/ 'bras bu'i shing dang/ spos kyi
shing dang/ 'phreng ba'i shing dang/ phyi ma'i shing dang/ bdug spos kyi shing sna tshogs kyis rab tubargyan pa kun nas gnas par gyur te/ 'di lta ste/ deb nA de bzhin gshegs
ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyasam tog kun nas rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang na 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'dug pa dang/ lha'i bu blo grosang shin tu brtan pa dang/
ba/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan yang gzi brjid chen po dga' khod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams pa nyan bzhin du gyur to// shes ba kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyapa las//
gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang bo'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyupa bam kho gsum pa/ pa'i tsho de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis/
'ag na lha dang bcas pa/ bdud dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa// dge sbyong dang bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa lhadang/ mi dang/ lham yin dang bcas pa mang
bo tshogs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa mang bo de dag 'dus par thugs su chud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa
ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/ shAr dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dang bsams dpa' chen po chos thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon par rdzogs b.ra'atshang rgya bar 'dod pas/ shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya'o// pa/ denas tshe dang ldan pa shAr drati'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
sams dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams ru rnam pa thams cad duman par rdzogs pa'atshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/ lha ra shes rab kyi phal tu zhi pa la brtson par bgyi/ de//
skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adas kyis/ tshe dang ldan pung+gashAr pAti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ la dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gnas pa med pa'i tshul du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sbyin pa dang/ gtong ba dang/ yongs su len pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir//
yongs su btang pa mdapa'i tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yos su rdzogs par bya'o// ltung ba dngami ltung bu bya ba med pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yos
su rdzogs par bya'o// 'khrug pa med pa'i phyir/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// lus dngasems kyi brtson 'grus nyams pa med pa'i phyir/ brtson
'grus kyis 'o tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 'khrug pa med cing ya sa su rtog pa med pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// chos k+kha/
[%]cad ma demigs pa'i phyir/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi kha khol tu phyin
pa la gnas te/ dran pa nyabar gzhag pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ dran pa nye par gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
ba pos/ shes bkyil rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ yang dag par sbyong ba'i dmigs pa'i phyir/ yang dag par song ba bzhi yos su rdzogs par bya'o// shAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sem
dba'asems dpa'achen pos/ shesab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rdzu 'phrul gyis bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// ga
dAti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha ngel tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dbang po mdamigs pa'i phyir/ dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ ba
radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes spapa kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ stobs mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ stobs lnga yongs su rdzo gas par bya'o//
shAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ byang chub kyi yan lagam dmigs pa'i phyi'o/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun
yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shur dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ lam mi dmigs pa'i phyi'i/ 'phags
ba'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yos su rdzogs par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ stongapa nyid mi
dmigs pa'i phyi/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'asas dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol
zadu phyin pa la gnas te/ mtshan ma med pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ smon pa med pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ smon pa mdapa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
sams dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ bsam gtan mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan bzhi yos su rdzogs par bya'o// shAr
dwa ti'i bu byung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ tshad med pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ tsha dmad pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pam dmigs pa'i phyir/ gzug
mad pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yos su rdzogs par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol duphyin pa la gnas te/ rnam
ba0 par thar ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rnam bsgyur brgyad yos su rdzogs par bya'o// gshArAdAti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
gnas te/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms bar 'jug ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang
chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lu gnas te/ mngon par shes pa ma dmigs pa'i phyir/ mngon par shes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o//
shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chupa sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyis rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ 'dushe ba dgu bsgom par bya ste/ 'di ltar rnam par bam pa mi dmigs/
pa'i phyir/ rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ 'bu
can mi dmigs pa'i phyi ro/ 'bu can gyi 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// shAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te//
rnam par rnags pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par rags pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// shAranA ti'i bu bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha la
tuphyin pa laganas/ rnam par dzamar ba mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par dmar pa'i 'du shes bsgom pa bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems
ba'achen pos/ sab kyi yal cun la gnas te/ ma par bsngos pami dmigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par bsngos pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// shAr dwa ti'i bu byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha bo' tuphyin pa la gnas te/ rnam par bros pa mi dmigs pa'i phyi ro/ rnam par zos pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o//
shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ gshis rab kyis rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam par 'byorab mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par 'thor ba'i shes
bsgom par bya'o// shAradwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha phyol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ a pa mi mges pa'i phyir/ sa pa'i'adu shes
bsgom par bya'o// shAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'asams dang 'chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam par tshig pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rnam par
tshig pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// bar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ mi mthun pam dmigs pa'i
phyi'i sros la mi mthun pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dba' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha phol tu phyin pa la gnas te// sangs
rgyas mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dba'asoms dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha thol tu phyin pa la gnas te/
chos ni dmigs pa'i phyir/ chos rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// shA radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/
'dun mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tun pa la gnas te/
tshul khrims me dmigs pa'i phyir/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphunang
la gnas te/ gtong pami dmigs pa'i phyir/ gtong ba rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// shur dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha la
tu phyin pa la gnas te/ lha mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ lha rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// kAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha khol
[@ g ]tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dbugs phyi nang du sgrub mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyab rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o// shA ra dwati'i bu byang chub sems/

sams dang 'asams dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ lus mi dmanges pa'i phyir/ lus kyi rnam pa rjes su drun pabasgom par bya'o// shA
dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achenapos/ shes rab kyi pha la tuphyin pa la gnas te/ mi rtag pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ mi rtag pa'i 'du shes bsgom bar

gyi 'du shes bsgom par bya'o// shAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ol gnas te/ bdag med pa mi dmigos pa'i phyir
bag med pa'i 'du shes bsgom par bya 'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'chin bos/ shes rab kyi pha khol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ mi sdug pa mi dmigs pa'i

ma demagos pa nI phyir/ 'tsho ba'i snyadu shes bsgom par bya'o// shAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ dga'/

sems dpa' sems dpa'achen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ zol gyis gnon pa'iskye mched mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ bril gyis gnon pa'i mched yong

'i baba'ia po bzhi bo su rdzogs khar bya'o/ nAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen pos/ sa rab kyi pha la tu phyin pa la gnas te ma/

parol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ spyod pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ spyod pa bsu yongs su rdzogs par bya// Arapra ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpar chen pos//

cha bos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ lhag ba'i bsam pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ lhag pa'i bsam pa nyi shu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shu dwapas/
bu byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chon pos/ sa ba kyi bcol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yang shes mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ thams cad m can pa'i/
ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// [︽]shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ zhi gnas
dang lhag mthong shes pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ zhi gnas dang lhag mthong shes pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos//
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas to/ rig pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ rig pa gsum yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shAr d+dati'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chan pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin bal gnas te/ so so yang dag pa ja rig pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ sos yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogasar ra bya'o// shAr du
ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'asemasadapa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ mi 'jigs pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su
rdzogs par bya/ kanA ra dra ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ ma nyams pas dmigs pa'i phyir/
ma nyams pa'i mngon pa rangashes pa lnga yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te//
pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// gshA ra da ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rtsold tu
phyin pa la gnas te/ nor mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ nor bdun yongs su rdzogasapar bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha la//
tu phyin pa la gnas te/ rnam par rtog pa mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ skyes bu chen po'i rnam par rtog pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'asem
dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas to/ sams can gyi gnas mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ sems canagyi gnas dgu yos su rdzogs par bya'o// shA ra dwa
ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs
ba'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// gshA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'asams dpa' chen pos/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sas rgyas kyi chos

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ byams pa chen po mi dmigs pa'i phyir/ byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub
