ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par ma 'gyur pa dag kyang yod do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'ad skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das/
de lta bu'i ye shes dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ ma dbul zhing 'phongs pa nyams su myong bar ma 'gyur ba dang//
khus gang dang ldan pas lha dang/ mdang/ lham yin gya nangan smad par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das/
sa[2]// kyis bka' stsal pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
sud kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i krungag bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo// chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang/ sangs
rgyas kyi zhing ga yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung
bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung ga bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo// chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dang 'a dge 'dun dang/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo// byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' rnonapo ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i
klung gabye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung ga bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo// chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa' dge
'dun dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang ma 'ong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten
gyi khams gang+ga'i klung ga bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra gcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas pa'i klung ga bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo// chos kyang nyon to// byang chub sems/
dpa'i dge 'dun dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas na/ byang shar gyi phyog
mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyad kyang mthong ngo// chos kyang
nyan to// byang chub sems dpa' dag 'dun dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' soms dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan
pas ni/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'gi rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung ga bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kA'i klung ga phyem snyed
kyang mthong ngo// chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dunadang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo// byang chub sams dpa' sems
dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas na) lho nubakyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
ma @#// rgyas gang+gA'i klung ga phye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo// chosakyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga yon tan rnam par phye bdag
kyang mthong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ya shes de lta bu dang ldan pas na/ nub byang ga phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung ga bye ma snyad kyi de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung ga phye masnyad kyang mthong ngo// chos kyang nyan to// byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun dang// sangs
rgyas kyi zhing ga yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pas na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'ag rten gyi khams
( gang+ga'i klung ga bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma med kyang magleng ngo// chos kyang nyan to/ byang chub sems dpa'i
dge 'dun dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba ngag kyang mthong ngo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ya shes de lta bu dang ldan pas ni/ seng ga phyogs kyi 'jig
rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye masnyed kya de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye masad kyang mthong ngo// chos kyang nyan to// byang chub
sems dang 'a dge 'dun dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo// ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po nasangs rgyas
kyi 'du shes ma skyed do/ chos kyi 'du shes ma skyed do// dge 'dun gyi 'du shes ma skyid do/ nyan thos kyi 'du shes ma skyid do// rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes ma skyid do// byang chub sems
dpa'i 'du shes ma skyid do// sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes ma skyid do// bdag ga 'du shes mi skyadango// gzhan gyi 'du shes ma skyod do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga 'du shes ma skyid do// ye shes de lta
bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyorade/ sbyin pa'i pha rol du mun pa ma dmigs so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyod
de tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma demags so/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ngo/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phun pa mdamags so/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol du phyin pa la spyod de
brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma ngamags so// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong de/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol du phyin pa mdamagasase// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pam dmags so// nang stong pa nyid sgom ste/ nang stong pa nyid ma dmigs so// phyi stong pa nyid sgom ste/ phyi stong pa nyade ma dmigs ]
so phyi nang stong pa nyid sgom// phyi nang stong pa de mdamags so// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid sgom ste/ stong pa nyid stong ba nyade ma dmags so// chen po stong
pa 'di sgom ste/ chen po stong pa de ma dmigs so// don dam pa stong pa de sgom ste/ don dam pa stong pa nyer ma dmigs so// 'dus byas stong pa nyid sgom ste// 'dus byas stong pa
nyid ma dmags so/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid sgom ste/ 'dus mabus stong pa nyeng mdamag sa so// mthu las 'angs pa song pa 'di semaste/ mtha' las 'das ba song pa nyid
klu ma dmags so// thog ma dang bla ma mang pastong pa nyid sgom ste/ thegam dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ma dmags so// dor ba med pa stong pa nyidi sgom ste/ dor ba med pa stong pa 'di
ma dmigs so// rang bzhin stong pa hade sgom ste// rang bzhin song pa nyade ma dmags sa chos thams cad seng pa de sgom ste/ chos zan sa rud stong pa nyid ma dmags so// rang
gi mtshan nyid stong pa de sgom ste rang gamtshan nyid stong pa 'ang me dmags so// mdamags pa stong pa nyid sgom ste/ ma dmigs pa stong pa nyid ma dmags so// dngos po med pa//
stong pa nyid sgom ste/ dngos po med pa stong pa 'di ma dmigs so// ngo bo nyid stong pa de sgom ste/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyadi ma dmags so// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid sgom
ste/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma dmags so// den pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi sgom ste/ dran pa 'a bar kha zhag pa rnams ma dmagis so// yang dag par spong ba bzhi son
sa yang dag par sbyong ba rnams me dmags so// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi sgom ste// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ma dmags so// dbang po lta sgom ste/ dbang po rnams ma
dmags so// stobs la sgom ste/ stobs rnams ma dmagis so// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun sgom ste// byang chub kyi yan lag rnamasam dmags so// 'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad pa sgom ste/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma dmags so// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sgom ste/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ma dmigasaso//
bsam gtan rnams sgom ste/ bsam gtan rnams ma dmags so// tshad med pa rnams sgom ste/ tshad med pa rnams mi dmags so// gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams
sgom ste/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams mdzemags so// rnam par thar pa brgyad sgom ste/ rnam par thar pa rnams ma dAmags so// mthar gyis gnas pa'i semasapar
'jug pa dgu sgom ste/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnamasam dmigs so// stong pa nyidi sgom lta/ stong pa de ma dmigs so// mtshan ma med pa sgom ste/ mtshan ma
ga shu'u// med pa ma remags so// smon pa med pa sgom ste/ smon pa med pa ma dmagos so// mngon par shes pa rnams sgom// mngon par shes pa rnams mdamigs so//
ting nge 'dzin rnams sgom ste/ ting nge 'dzin rnamasam dmagis so// gzungs kyi sgo rnams sgom ste/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams ma ngemags so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcusgom ste/
(de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ma demagos so// ma 'jigs pa bzhi sgrom ste/ ma 'jigs pa rnams ma dmar sa so// so se yang dag par rage pa bzhi sgom ste 3 so so yang dag
par rig pa rnams ma dmigs so// byams pa chen po sgom ste/ byams pa chen po ma dmags so// sang rje chen po sgom ste/ sange rje chen po ma demags so// sangs rgyas kyi chos
ma 'dres pa bco brgyad sgom ste/ sangs rgyas kyi tshes ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ma dmagasas// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu sgom ste/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ma dmigs so/
lce lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu sgom ste/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ma dmagis so// phyi'i ma 'ing ba'i 'bras bu sgom ste/ phyir ma 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mdamagos so//
dgra bcom pa de sgom ste/ dgra bcom pa 'a'i mi dmags so// rang byang chub sgom ste/ rang byang chub ma dmigs so// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa de sgom ste/ lam gyi rnam
pa shes pa 'dra ma dmags so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyang sgom ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyang ma mgas so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di na byang chub sems dpa'/
sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes te/ ye shes de dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par byed da
sangs rgyas kyi chos kums cad kyang yang dag par rdzas su mamathong ngo// / ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pal spyod pa'i tsho/ mge lnga rab tu 'thob pa dang/ yongs su sbyong ba yod de/ lnga gung zhen/ 'di lta ste/ sha' mag dang/ lha'i mag dang/ shes rab kyi mig dang/ chos
kyi mag dang/ sangs rgyas kyi mag go gso' pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenango 'ga'imag yongs su dag pa gang lags/ gson
ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA dra ti'abu byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po sha' mig gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub semasadapa sam/
dpa' chen po sha' mig gis dpag tshad nyis brgya mthong ba yong ngo// shAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha' mig gis dpag tshad sum brgya mthong ba yod do// shA
tu'u// ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dang 'a sams dpa' chen po sha'amag gis dpag tshad bzhi rgya mthong ba yod do// shAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems//
dpa' chen po sha' mag gis dpagatshad lnga brgyamathong ba yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha' mag gas dpag tshad drug brgya mgrong ba yod do// shA
ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mag gis dpag tshad bdun brgya mashong pa yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis
dang ga tshad brgyad brgya mthong ba yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sams dpa' sams dpa' chen po sha'i mag gis dpag tshad dgu brgya mthong phu yong do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sem
dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mag gis dpag tshad stong mgrong ba yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenango sha' mag gis 'dzam bu'i gling mthong ba yod
do shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shA'i mag gis glang gnyis pa mthong ba yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po sha'
mag gas glang gsum pa mthong ba yod do// shAr dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mga' sa glang chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do// shA ra dwa
tA'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sums dpa' chen po'i zhig gis stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mthongal yod de// ar dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig
gis stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha' mig gas stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'i 'jig rten gyi khams/
mthong ba yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'dazhi byeng chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po' sha' mig yongs su ngag pa'o/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyang chub sems
dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shAr dwa ti'i bu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha' mag gang yin
pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi lha' mag gang yan pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// mtshama'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mag
dag yin pa de na/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi lha' mgagang yin pa de na/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes sa// 'phrul dga' lha rnams kyi
lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyi lha' mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//
[p]// tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyilha'i mgi gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshangs lha nyeyan gyalha rnamasakyi lha'i mige gang yin pa de ni/ byang/
chub sems dpas rab tu shesaso// tshangs pa kun 'khor spyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mge gang yane pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tushesaso// tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mag/
gang yan pa de ni/ byang chu bsems dpas rab tu shesaso// snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// chung snang galha rnams kyi lha'i
mag gang yan pa de ni/ byang chub sems pas rab tu shes so// tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yan pa de na/ byung chub sems dpas rab tu shes so kun snang dang
pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'amagagang yin pade na/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shesaso// dag pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so//
lce chung dga' lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yan pa de na byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang chub sems dang sa rab tu
shes so// dge rgyus kyi lha rnams kyi lha' mig gang yanipa de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// che ba' lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni/ byang+gachub sems dpas rab
[f]shes so// chung che'i lha rnams kyi lha' mag gang yin pa de na) byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// tshad med cha ba' lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de na/ byang chub samA
dpas rab tu shes so// 'bras bu cheba' lha rnams kyi lha' mag gang yin pa de na/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// ma che ba'i lha rnams kyalha'i mig gang yin pa dra ni/ byang chub
sems dpas rab tu shes so// mgadung ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de na/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// shan tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa
de ni/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shesaso// gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de na/ byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so// 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mag
gang yin pa de na/ byang chub sems dpasarab tu shes so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyis
ma shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis mashes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
lha' ma ga de ni/ mtshema'i lha rnams kyis ma shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha' mal de na/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis na shes so// byang chub
soms dba'asems dpa' chen po'i lca' mge de ni/ 'phrul dga' lha rnams kyis ma shesaso// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i migaden
gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis maye shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de na/ tshangs sa kyi lha rnams kyis ma shes so// byang chub sems dpa'i
sems dpa' chen po' lha' migaden/ tshangs lha zhen gyi lha rnams kyis ma shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha' mag de ni/ tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams
kyis ma shes so// byang chub sems dang sems dang 'a chen po la lha'i mig de na/ tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis ma shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i wa'i mgi
de naM/ snang ba'i lha rnams kyis ma shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'achen po'i lha' mgade ni/ nga snang gi lha rnams kyis ma shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po'i lha'amagi de ni/ tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams kyis ma shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyis
ma shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i migado ni/ dge ba'i lha rnams kyis ma shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de na//
'thabachung dga' lha rnams kyis ma shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de na/ tshad med dge ba' lha rnams kyis ma shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a
chen po'i lha' mag de na/ dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis ma shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i migaden/ tshe ba'i lha rnams kyis ma shes so/ 'phyang chub sems
dang 'a sems dpa' chen po'i lha'amag de na/ rlung che'i lha rnams kyis ma shes so// byung chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po'i lha' mig de na/ tshad mang che ba'i lha rnams kyis ma
shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lhakha mig yen 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis ma shes so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig
de na/ ma chab ' lha rnams kyis ma shesaso// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de na/ ma gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis ma shes so// byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po'i lca' mig rten/ shan tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyis ma shes so// chung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni/ gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyis
shas so// dung chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mag de ni/ 'og min gyi lha rnams kyis ma shes te/ lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
chen po ni/ shar phyogs kyi 'a jig rten gyi khams ba da'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang/

chu ba sems dpa' semasadapa' chenapon/ klophyogasakyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sams can rnams kyi 'chi'apho dang skye ba rab tu shesaso// lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i
byang chub sems dpa'aems dpa' chen po ni/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung ga bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye bu rab tu shes so// lha'i mig de lta
bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi kha gapa'i klupag bye ma snyed kyisoms can rnams kyi 'chi'apho dngasku ba rab tu shes so//
lha' ma'i de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung ga byi ma god kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi yo
dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lca'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi nyi ma snyed kyi/
sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rang shes so// lha'i mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems ngang 'a sems dpa' chen po ni/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams/
'a00/ gang+ga'i klung ga bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha' mig de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ nub byang gi phyogs
mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho dang skye ba rab tu shes so// lha'i mgade lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
ma pon 'og ga phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi khrims can rnams kyi 'cha'apho dang skyo ba rab tu shes so lca'i ag de lta bu dang ldan pa' byang chub sems dpa'i

sems dpa' chen po ni/ seng ga phyogs kyi 'dzag rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'cha'apho dang skye ba rab tu shes so// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub mas dpa'
sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mgi yongs su dag pa'o/// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgyu pa bam po bcu gnyis pa// gsol pa//
bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems 'a chen po'i shes rab kyi mgo yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas sam/ dge ba 'am/ mi dge ba 'am/ khams glo ba dang bcas pa 'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa 'am/
kun nas nyon mong pa 'an/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa 'am/ 'jig rten pa 'am/ 'jig rten las 'dasapa 'am/ thag pa dang bcas pa 'am/ zagapa med pa'i chos
gang yang ma shes pa med pa dang/ shes rab kyi mag dang ldan pas/ chos ga nga la nga ma ma shong ba med ma thos pa med/ ma bsams pa ched/ khong du ma chud ba med pa 'dan shA ra dwa ti'i bu byung
chub soms dpa' sems dpa' chenango 'ashes rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o// gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sams dang 'a sems dpa' chen po'i tshes kyi mig
yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'asal la/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi mig gis gang zag 'di ni dad
pa'i rjes su 'gro ba/ gang zag 'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'gro ba/ gang zag 'ad na snying pa nyid la gnas pas// gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis
skye bar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro// de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba' seng shes mazeng ba skye bar gyur ro// rnam par
grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang/ bla rtsom dang/ tshul khrims dang/ brtul zhugs bsams pa'i kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur to/ gang zag 'ad
ni rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ nges bsgom pa'i las rab tu thob nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang/ ngan sems rab tu bsrabs par byed de/ gang zag 'di na lan ga phur 'ong pa 'os
de lam de nyed de bas kyang shan tu bsgoms nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems rab tu song ba thob par byed/ gang zag 'di ni phyir ma 'ong pa'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang shar tu/
bsgoms pas/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang/ gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang/ ma rig pa dang/ nga rgyal dang/ rgod pa rab tu spong// gang zag 'di ni dgu bcom pa'o// gang zag
'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnasapa ste/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshanam med pas skye bur 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas de ma thag pa' ting nge 'dzin klob par 'gyur ro//
de ma thag pa'i dang nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba' pa shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang the tshom dang/ tshul khrims dang/
brtul zhugs bsams pa' kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o// des bsgom pa'i lam rab tu thobanas/ 'dodapa'i 'dod chags
dang/ ngan sems rab tu bsubs par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni lan tsag phyir 'ong ba'o// de lam ded de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems rab tu spong
ba thob par byed de/ gang thag 'ad ni phyir ma 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyed de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms pas/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang/ gzugs med pa'i
'dod chags dang/ ma rag pa dang/ nga rgyal dang/ rgod pa rab tu sbyong g+ha/ gang zag 'di ni des bcom pa'o// gang zag 'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga
ni rnam pa ra spar pa'i sgo smon pa med pas skyebar 'gyur ro// dbang po lngas dem grag pa' dang de 'azhi krob par 'gyur ro// de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong
ba skye bar 'gyur ro// rnam par grol ba'i ya shes ma thong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang/ the tshom dang/ tshul khrims dang/ brtul zhugs bsAms pa 'a kun tu sbyor ba gsum rab song
bar 'gyur te/ gang zag 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o// des bsgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang/ ngasams rab tu bsrungs par byed de/ gang
zag 'don lan cig phyir 'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang shin tu bsgoms nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems rab tu spong ba shogra par byed de/ gang zag 'di ni phyir mi
'ong ba'o// de lam de nyid de bas kyang 'an tu bsgoms pas/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang/ gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang/ ma reg nga dang/ nga rgyal dang/ rgod
[%]pa rab tu song ste/ gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa'o zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mag yongs su dgang
shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gang ci'ang rung sta/ kun 'byung ba'i chos canange ngag nyams rud ni/ 'gag pa'i chos can no zhes bya bar
shes pas dad pa la sogs pa dngang po lnga thob par 'gyur te/ 'di ni shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'a chos kyi mag yongs su dag pa 'o// shA ra dwa na
bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi mig gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
la spyod do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma
spyod de// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phun pa la spyodado// de'i rgyus dad pa'i dbang po dang// brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang ldan te/ thabs mkhas pas ched du bsams te/ lus yongs su 'dzin par byed do//

dgo pa'i rtsa ba brtan pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skya'o// bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye'o// khyim bdag che zhing mgo ba'i rigs su
[9f]@#/ skye 'o/rgyal chen bzhi ris kyi lha 'di nang du skya'o// sun cu rtsa gsum gyi lha' nang du skye'o// mtshama'i lha'i nang du skya'o/ dga' ldan gyi lha' nang du skya'o// 'phrul dga'i
lha' nang du skye'o// gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i nang du skye'o// de dedag na gnas gang sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed par 'gyur te// bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis de dag la rim gror
byed par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la'ang bsnyen bkur byed bar 'gyur
ro/ rim gro dang/ bkur sa dang/ phu dung dang/ mchod pa byed par 'gyur ro// nyan thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ngo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
'di ni dran med pa la nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dum ngon par sangs rgyas kyi 'or du phyi'i ldog par ma 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shos te/ shAr dwa ti'i bu 'di'ang byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mag yongs su dag pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sams dang 'a sems dpa' chen po 'den
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o// 'din lung ma bstun pa// 'di nings pa'o// 'di ni ma nges pa'o// 'din lung bstan par 'gyur ba'o//
ma 'ang ni lung bstan par mi 'gyur ba'o// 'di dag ni phur ma ldeg pa sta/ dbang po thob pa'o// 'di dag ni phyir ma ldog pa ma yin pa ste/ dbang po ma thob pa'o// 'di na mngon par
shes pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// 'di ni mngon par shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po 'di na mngon par shes ba yongs su rdzogs pas/
shar phyogs kyi 'gi rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi khu ma rgyud dag tu song zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim
gro dang/ bkur sti dang/ phu dung dang/ mchod pa byed do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tusong zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang/ bkur sti dang/ phu dud dang/ mchod pa byed do// nub phyogs kyi 'jigarten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung ga bye ma snyed dag tu
song zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa ra rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang/ bkur sa ngang/ phu dud dang/ mchod pa byed do// byang
phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khamasagang+ga'i klung gi bye masnyedadag tu song 9 nge de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim
glodang bkur sti dang/ phu dud dang/ mchod pa byed do// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing/
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang/ bkur sa dang/ phu dud dang/ mchod pa byed do// shar
lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gabye ma snyed dag tu song zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes bar
byed do// rim gro dang/ bkur sa dang/ phu dud dang/ mchod pa byedado// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi ma snyad dag tu song zhing/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang/ bkur sti dang/ phu dud dang/ mchod pa byed do// nub byung ga phyogs
zhwa mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung ga byi ma nad dug tu song zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyus rnams mnyes par byed do// rim
gro dang/ bkur sadang/ phu dud dang// mchod pa byed do// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung ga bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang/ ba kur sti dang/ phu dud dang/ mchod pa byed do// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu/
song zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'asangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do// rim gro dang/ bkur stadang/ phu dud dang/ mchod pa byed do// 'dis ni
mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro// 'dis na mngon par shes pa zlob par ma 'gyur ro// 'ad ni bzod pa thob pa'o/ 'di ni bzod pa thob pa ma yin no// 'di ni dbang po thob pa'o//
'di ni dbang po thob pa ma pa na no// byang chub semasadapa'asems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na yongs su dag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
'di'i sas rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par ma 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni smon lam chen po dang ldan pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po 'di ni smon lam chen po dang ma ldan pa'o// 'das nasams can yongs su sman par byas so// 'dis nasoms can yongs su snyan par ma byas so// byang chub sems
dpa' sems dang 'chen po 'di la naM/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams g+hAng+gA'i klung ga bye masnyad dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams legs pa brjod pa mdzad do// 'di la
bya legs pa brjod pa ma mdzad do// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di deganasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro//
'di dag ni na bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'ad ni byang chub sems dpa' thob nas/ tshedapag tu med par 'gyur ro// 'di'i tsho nadapag
tu yod par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i 'od dang/ dbyangs dang/ dge slong gi dge 'dunan tshad med par 'gyur ro// 'di'i natshod yod par 'gyur
ro// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyus nas byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun dang ldan
par 'gyur ro// 'dan ldan par ma 'gyur ro// 'di ni dka' ba spyod par 'gyur ro// 'di ni byed par ma 'gyur ro// 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa'o// 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa ma yin no//
'di ni sAng po byang chub la 'dug par 'gyur ro// 'di ni 'dug par mi 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni bdud yod pa ram 'gyur ro// 'di dag
la ni yod par 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ de ltar na shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mag yongs su dag pa yin no/
wa6 gsol pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA
ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi rjes la/ rdo rje lta bu'i treng nge 'dzin la mnyam par gzhag nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
thob par byed de/ de na de bzhun gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa yin/ ma 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan/
ba yani/ byams pa chen po dang ldan pa yani/ nga rje chen po dang ldan pa yin/ dga' ba chen po dang ldan pa yin/ btang snyoms chen po dang ldan pa yani/ sangs
rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa dang ldan pa yin/ de na de'i mag ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig de dag dang ldan pas/ rnam pa thams cad du ma/
mgrong pa 'am/ ma thos pa 'am/ ma shes pa 'am/ khong du ma chud pa gang yang med de/ shArapra ti'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
ba'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'asangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig lnga longs
su sbyong bar 'dod pa dang/ thob par 'dod pas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug la brtson par bya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ru'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol du phyin pa drug
bdudage ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ nyan thos kyi chos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ma 'dus pa
med do// shAr dwa ti'i bu la la zhug yang dag par sla bas dge ba'i tshes thams cad 'dus zhesabarjod pa zhig tu dgongs nas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par sabs brjod do//
da ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na mig lnga bskyod pa'o/mge lnga po de dag la bslabs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni/ bla
named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya'o// shA ra dwa ti'i bu shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu 'thob ste/ de rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa du ma nyams su myong bar byed do// de nas chen po 'da'ong rab tu g.yo bar byed do// gcig
du rgyur snying mang po 'gyur ro// mang por gyur rung gcig tu 'gyur ro// snang ba dang ma snang ba'ang nyams su myong bar byed de// rtsig pa las thal ba dang/ ra ba las thal ba dang/
tshan ra las bral bar thogs pa med pa la lus kyis 'gro ste/ dper na nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no// nam mkha' la'ang rgyal mo krung gis 'gro ste// dper na 'dab chags bya
bzhin no// sa la'ang gyen du 'byung ba dang/ 'og tu 'dzul bar byed de/ dper na chu la byab bzhin no// chu la'ang 'bying ba med par 'gro ste/ dper nas la bya ba bzhin
no du bar 'khrul zhing ma 'bar t+tho/ dper na ma'i phung po chen po bzhinano// nyam dang zla ba 'di dag 'di ltar rdzu 'phrul che la/'di ltar mashu che zhing/ 'di ltar dbang che ba dag kyang
lag pas byugs shang/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rten gyi bar du lus kyis dbang sgyur te/ rdzu 'phrul des rlom sams su 'gyur ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin gyis stong pa dang
rang bzhin gyis dben pa dang/ rang bzhin gyis ma skyes pa'i phyir/ des rdzu 'phrul gang gis rlomasams su 'gyur ba'i rdzu 'phrul de lta bu mdamags te/ de thams rud mkhyen pa nyid
yid la bya ba ma gtogs par rdzu 'phrul lam/ rdzu 'phrul mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang ma skyed do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenapo shes rab
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no// de ni lha'i rna ba'akhams rnam par
0 bya@#// dag pa ma las 'das pas lha dang ma gnyis ka'i sgra thos te/ lha'i rna ba'i khams des bdag ni sgra ces bya bar rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do// de na 'di ltar des rang
bzhin stong pa dang/ rang bzhin dben pa dang/ rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyiri rnab dang sgrar dmags pa med de/ de thams cad mkhyen par yid la bya ba ma gtogs par/ lha'i rna pa'i khams la bsam

pa'ang ma skyid do// de ltar na shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa' chenapo shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa laspyod pa'i tshe/ lha'i rnapa' khams mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye
shes mngon par sgrub pa yaneno// des sems can pha roladang/ gang zag pha rol gyi semasasems kyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i
sems la 'dod chags dang ldan pa 'a sams zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shesaso// 'dod chags dang bral ba'asams la 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa

lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sams la zhe sdang dang ldan pa'asams zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// zhe sdang dang bral ba'i sam la zhe sdang dang
bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// gti mug dang ldan pa 'a sams la gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab
tu shes so gti mug dang bral ba'amam la gti mug dang bral ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes med// med pa dang ldan pa 'a sems la srid pa dang
ldan pa'i soms zhes bya bar yang dgadzar dzil ba bzhin du rab tu shesaso// srid pa dang bral ba'i soms la sred pa dang bral ba'i soms zhes bya dang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes
sa 'bar lenapa dang bcas pa'i sems la 'bar len pa dang bcas pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nye b.len pa mad pa'i sems la lta bar len pa/
med pa'asems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// kun nas 'dus pa 'i sems la kun nas 'dus pa'asams zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhan du rab tu shes so//
rnam par 'phros pa'i sems la rnam par 'phros pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shosaso// rgya chung ba'i sams la rgya chung ba'i soms zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji ltab
bzhin du rab tu shesaso// rgya cheba' samasalargya cheba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu gsaso// yangs pa'i soms la yang pa' sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhi/
du rab tu shes so// tshad med pa'i sems la tshad med pa'asams zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhinadu rab tu shesaso// mnyam par gzhag pa'i sams la mnyam par gzhag pa' sems
ma'ang rjes su dran no// bsal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'ang rjes su dran te/ bdag na de lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug ste/ ming ni 'di zhes bya/ rusan 'di zhes
bya rigs na 'du zhesabya/ kha zas ni 'di lta bu zhig za zla/ yunan 'di srid gcig tu 'dug 'dug/ tshe'amatha' na 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/ de ltar bdag de nas sha 'bosanas na chage mo
zhig du skyes so zhes bya ba nas/ de nas sha 'phes nas ni/ 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang pa sa/ ngan rtags dang bcas par bdag dang gzhan
gyi sngon gyi gnas rnam pa du ma tshesasu dranate/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes de kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do// de ni 'di ltar de shes de
ye shes ma yin te/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de ni bdag las rab tu shes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med de/ 'di ltar des ye shes de nyid kyang rang bzhin song pa dang/ rang
bzhin dben pa dang/ rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/ gang gis rlom semasasu 'gyur ba de lta bu'i ye shes mdegs so// de na thams cad mkhyen brkang yid la bya ba ma gtogs par/
rjes su dran pa'i ye shes kyi rten du bsam pa tsam yang mi skyod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la phyed pa'i tshe/ sngon
[4/]gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin na// de ni lha'i mig rnam par dag pa ma las 'das pasasems can 'a'apho
dang/ skye ba dang/ kha dog sbugar dang khadog ma sdug ba dang/ bzang ba dang/ ngan pa dang/ ngan song na gnas pa dang/ bde 'gro na gnas pa dag kyang rab tu shes te/ sems can 'di das/
na lus kyi las ngan du spyod pa dang ldan/ ngag gis ngan du byed pa dang/ yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa// 'phags pa rnams la skur pa 'debs pa/ leg par lta ba
rnams te/ de'i rgyu do'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas/ ngan song dngangan 'gro log par ltung ba sems can dmyal ba dag tu skye'i// sems can 'di dag na lus kyis legs par spyod pa
dang ldan/ ngag gis legs par sbyod pa dang ldan/ yadakyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa ma 'debs pa/ yang dag par lta ba rnams te/ de'argyu de'i rkyen gyis 'u
zhig nas/ bde 'gro mag+ho ras kyi 'jig rten du lha'i nang du skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ de ltar phyogs bcu kun gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi debyangs sa saM pa/ nam mkha'i
mthas gtugs pa dag gi 'gro ba drug tu gtogs pa rnams kyi skye ba dang/ 'chi 'pho yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes te/ des kyang rlom sems su 'gyur ba med do// de ni 'di ltar
zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// mnyam par ma gzhig pa'i sems la mam par ma gzhag pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba
gzhan du rab tu shes so// rnam par grol ba'i sems la rnam par grol ba'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shesaso// rnam par m grol ba'i sems la rnam par ma
zla grol ba'i soms zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shesaso// zag pa dang b.rus pa' sems la thag pa dang/ rus pa'isams zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu
shes so// zag pa med pa'i sems la zag pa med pa'i sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shesase// nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'i sams la nyon mongs pa dang bas
pa' sems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// nyon mongs pa med pa'i sems la nyon mongs pa med pa'asems zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shesaso//
bla na yod pa'i sams la thun yod pa'asimasazhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so// bla na med pa'i sems la bla na med pa'asoms zhes bya bar yang dag pa ji lta
ba bzhin du rab tushes te/ gzhan gyi sams shes pa des rlom sams su 'gyur ba 'ang med do// de ni 'di ltar sems de nyid bsam kyis ma khyab pa'i phyir te/ de na bdag shes
ba03/se zhes bya bar rlom sems med de// 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang/ rang bzhin dben pa dang/ rang bzhin ma skyes pa'aphur/ gang gis rlom sems su 'gyur ba de lta
bu'i sems ma dmags te// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yang la bya ba ma gtogs par/ sams shes par bya ba'i bsam pa 'am sams shes pa mngon nga ra sgrub pa'aphasamaM
pa tsam yang ma skyid do// shAr dwa ta'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod rung/ sems can thams cud kyi sems
dang sbyod pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no// de ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes
rnam po du ma mngon par sgrub// sems gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nAs/ sems brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no// ma gcig kyang rjes su dran pa nas/ 2ma brgya' bar
du'ang rjes su dran no// zla ba gcig rjes su dran pa nas/ zla ba brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dranano// lo gcig rjes su dran pa nas/ le brgya'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no// bsal pa gcig
rjes su dran pa sa/ bskal pa brgyu'i bar du'ang rjes su dran no// bsal pa brgya phrag du ma'ang rjes su dran no// bsal pa stong phrag du ma'ang rjes su dran no// bsal pa brgya stong du
ngaH ga// mayig de mag ma yin zhing/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir te/ de bdag gis mthong ngo zhes bya bar rlom sams med do// de yang 'ar ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang/ rab zhin
dben pa dang/ rang bzhin ma skyes pa'i phyir/ gang gas rlomasems su 'gyurab ' mag de lta bu des ma ngamags te/ de ni thams cad mkhyen pa skad yid la bya ba mar gtogs par lca' mig gi/
bsam pa 'am/ lha'i mig mngon par sgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang ma skyed do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing
lha' mgu mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yanino// de na zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes mngon par sgrub kyang/ nyan
thos kyis 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa thob par ma byed do// gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ba de lta bu'i tshos kyang gang yang ma mthong ngo// de mngon par
shes pa des rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par byas nas/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu song bar byed de/ zag pa zad pa mngon du bya ba mngon par shes pa
des rlomasamasasu 'gyur ba med do// de na 'di ltar ye shes de 'de ye shes ma yin zhing bsamagyis ma khyab pa'aphyir// de dag gas rab tu shes so zhesabya bar rlom sems med de/ de
waM yang 'di ltar rang bzhin stong pa dang/ rang bzhin dben pa dang/ rang bzhin ma skyes pa' phur/ gang gsarlom sems su 'gyur phu'azag pa zadapa' ye shes mngon du gyur lo nga
shes ba re lta bu ma dmags so// de ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la bya ba ma gtogs par/ zag pa zad pa' ye shes kyi bsam pa 'am zag pa zad nga mon du lu ka pe des khyon par
sgrub pa'i bsam pa tsam yang ma rnyed do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshi/ khag pa bo na du bya ba'i mtshon/
par shes pa' ye shes mngon par sgrub pa yin no// shA radwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dang 'asams dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa la de ltar spyod rung kyi lo/ padapa drug
yongs su rdzogs par byed pan/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis rnam par 'alal lo// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'ang ltar yang byang chub sems dang 'asems dpa'i
chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa kare kyi yari/ chags pa med pa'asams nye bar bzung
bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
bya// pa'atsho/ tshul khrims mya pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing/ mar las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi re/ 'babacu ba med pa zhe bar bzung bas rnam pa thams
cang mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam sbyong pa dag kyang yod de// shor dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyibal spyod pa'i tshe/bzod pa'i pha rol tu/
bzhi pa la gnas shing/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ ma 'khrug pa che bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyud kyi lamasbyong ba dag kyang yod do// shAr dwa ti'i 'u'adaltar gang
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'atsho/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu byonepa la gnas shing/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phyir/lus
dang sems kyi brtson 'grus ma gzhug pa bar bzung bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam slong ba dag kyang yod do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu 'di ltar yang byang chub sems dpa' thams
dang 'chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'atsho/ bsam gtanargyapha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing/ mtha' las 'dus pa stong ra 'ad kyi phyir/ 'khrug pa med pa'i sems
bar bzung bas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa de kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// shAr dra ti'i bu 'daltar yang byang chub sems dang 'a sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa la sbyod ba'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shang/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phunge/ shes rab 'chal pa'i sems ma dmags pa nye bar bzung
bas rnam pathoms cad mkhyenapa nyid kyi lam sbyong ba dag kyang yod do// shAr dwa ti'i bu de ltaran byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'tsho
pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid kyi phur/ 'ong ba med pa dang 'gro ba med pa nye bar bzung ste/ yongs su 'dzin pa med pa nye bar bzung bas rnam pa than
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam yongs su sbyong ba yin no// de la sbyin pa na yangs su 'dzin pad bar bzung ba las gdags so// tshul khrims na tshul khrims ngan pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags
so bzod pan 'khrug pa zhe bar bzung ba las gdags so// brtson 'grus ni le lo zhe bar bzung ba las gdags so// ting nge 'dzani na mnyam par ma bzhag pa nye bar bzung ba las gdugs/
so/ shes rab na shes rab 'chal pa nye bar bzung ba las gdags te/ de ni rgyal po zhes bya bar rlomasamasamad do// ma rgal to zhes bya bar u0f7cmasems med do// sbyin pa byed do zhes bya bar rlom
sems med do// spyan pa ma byed do zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// tshul khrims dang ldan n zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// tshul khrims nganapa can no zhes bya bar rlomasams mdaro// bzod pa
phun sum tshogs so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// khrod can no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// brtson 'grus brtsams pa'o zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// le lo
canano zhes bya bar rlom sems medado/ mnyam par gzhag pa'o zhes bya bar rlomasems med do// mnyam par ma gzhag pa'o zhes bya bar rlomasams med do// shes rab dang ldan no zhes bya
bar rlom sems medade// shes rab 'chal pa can no zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// sos so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// phyag byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// rim gro/
byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// rim gro ma byas so zhes bya bar rlom sams med do// de ci'aphuri zhen/ shA ra dwa ti'i bu ma skyes pa nAskyes so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do//
phug byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// rim gro byas so zhes bya bar rlom sems med do// rim gro ma byas so zhes bya bar rlomasems chod do// de nu'i phur zhan/ 'di ltar shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa na rlom sems thams cad yang dag par gcod pa'i phyir te/ 'di la shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rel tu phyin pa la/
spyod pa'i tshe/ yon tan ji sId cig yod pa de dag ni/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad la med de/ de yon tan 'di dag yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i tsho/ sems
can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang yongs su dag par byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zad kyang slob par byed do// shAr dwa ti'abu
gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'atsho/ sems can thams cad la soms pa'i somasabaskyed de/ sems can kums
chadal mnyam pa 'i sams bskyed nus/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid rab tu thob bo// chos thams cad mnyam pa de rab tu thob nas/ chos skams cad mnyam pa nyid la sems can
thams cad rab tu 'god do// de na tshe 'ad nyade la'ang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs su byonacing/ dpon par bya ba yin te/ byang chub sems dpa' lhumasarud dang/
nyan thos thams rud dang/ rang sangs rgyas skrums cad kyis kyang yid du 'ong zhing dpan par bya ba yin/ nga ni skye ba gang dang gang du skyes kyang/ de dang de dag tu nam yang mgags yad du ma'ang
ba'i gzugs ma mthong ngo// rna bas yang du ma 'ong ba'i snyam brosaso// snas yod du mi 'ong ba'i dra ma tshor ro// lces yid du ma 'ong pa'i re ma myong ngo// lus kyis yade du ma 'ang
ba'i reg bya ma reg go/ mde kyas yod du ma 'ong nga' tshos rnam par rig pa med do// shA ra dwa ti'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
de ltar spyod pa na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las yo sa su nyams par ma 'gyur ro// shes rab kyapha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di ston
pa'i tshe/ dge slong sum brgyas gos gyon gyon ba pangom ldan 'das la yon du gsol te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do// de nas bcom
zlo ldan 'a dus kyis de'i tshe zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/ pus mo g.ya sa pa'i lha nga sa la
btsugs te/bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der logs su thal mo sbyar bas bdud de/ brtsem ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bom pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas rnams na rgyu ngang rkyen ma na sa par bzhud pa ma mdzad na/ rtsi'i rgyu ru'i rkyen gyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/
y+Yo (tshodang ldan pa dga' bo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// dga' bo dge slong sum brgya po 'di dag// bskal pa drug cu rtsa gtsag 'das nas/ bsal pa dang skar ma lta bu la/ de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpal chen po zhes bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung ngo// 'di dag ni 'di nas sha 'phos nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom

ba yang dag par rdzogs pa 'i sangs rgyas ma basprul pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skya'o// 'dod pa la spyod pa'i lha 'a bu stong phrag drug cus kyang bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu
sems bskyed de// de dag kyang de ba zhin gshegs pa dgra rtsom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro// de nyid du rang du byung nas tshangs pa'i sats+tsha
spyor pa ra 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa byams pa res kyang de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa ra 'gyur ro// de nas sangs rgyas
mchus de 'tshe/ 'khor bzhi po de dag na 'di ni 'khod bzhin du/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// nub phyogs
kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyisangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// shar lho' phyogs mtshams
kyisangs rgyas stong ma rdzong bar gyur to// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// nub byang ga phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// 'og g.yos
kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// steng gi lcogs kyi sangs rgyas stong mthong bar gyur to// 'dzag rten gyi khams de dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi/
[y ]/ yon tan rnam par phye ba gang ji lta bu r mthong ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga yon tan rnam par phye pa de dag ni/ mdzod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dan yod par ma mthong ngo//
de nas 'khor de' nang nas srog chags stong phrag bcus bdag cag las las gang byas pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur pa de lta bu'i las sbyang par bya'o zhes smon lam
btab bo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi bu de dag gi bsam pa shugs su chud nas zhal 'dzum pa mdzad do// de nas tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo stan las langs te/
bla gosaphrag pa gcig la gzar nas/ pus mo ba pas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das gan bde legs su bral mo sbyar bas btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol
to bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rgyu dang rkyen ma mchis par bzhad pa ma mdzad na/ mi'i rgyu pa'i rkyen gyis zhal 'dzum pa mdzad/ bcom na 'das kyis bka' stsal/
pa dga' bo srog chags stong phrag bcu po 'di dag maN+Dong ngam/gsol pa/bcom ldan 'das mthong ngo// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dga' ba srog chags stong phrag 'acu po
zad deg na 'dunas sha'aphos nasasangs rgyas kya zhing de dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams dang yang nam du'ang mi
'bral te/ phyi ma'adus nA de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogasab 'i sangs rgyas rgyun gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba sha stag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyu'o//

de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang/ tshe dang ldan pa mo'u 'gal gyi bu chen po dang/ tshadang ldan pa rab 'byor dang/ tshe dang ldan pa bshes pa'i bu gang po dang/ tshongang ldan pa 'od sgra/
po dang/ drage slong gzhan dag kyang kun rgyus mngon par shes pa shin dumang ba dag dang/ byang chub semasadapa' sems dpa' chen po shan tu mang ba dag dang/ dge slong pha dang/ dge skyes
dang/ dge bsnyen pha dang/ dge snyen ma shani tumang ba dag gas/bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
dba' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yangs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa dam pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab bo// bcom ldan
'das 'ad lta sta/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa phul lo// bcom ldan 'das 'di
la ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol du phyin pa mchog go/ bcom ldan 'das 'di la so ! sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
rgyu pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dang 'a soms dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pargya nom pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang rmugasems
dpa' sems dpa' chenapo rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzang po'o// bcom ldan 'das 'ad lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dang 'a chen po rnams
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bla na ma mchis pa'i// bcom ldan 'das 'di ltaste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ltag
lce na ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'du lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'ad ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chenApo rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam pa ma mchis pa'o//
bcom ldan 'das 'dalta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi mnyam pa dngamanyam pa'o// bcom ldan 'das

pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi pha rol tu phyin ba mtshungs pa ma mchis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'ad lta// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di

no byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu mun pa 'di la spyod pa dag ni/ lha dang/ mi dang/ lha ma yan du bcas pas phyag bya bar 'os

bar 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs mazhing mthoba' rogs dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bram ze che zhing mtho ba'arigs dag 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// khyab bdag che zhing
